item.title: Bridge returned error 500! (18673)
item.content:encoded:
blm5280 - Instagram Bridge was unable to receive or process the remote website's content!
Error message: `Unable to find username in search result.`
Query string: `action=display&bridge=Instagram&context=Username&u=blm5280&media_type=all&direct_links=on&format=Atom`
Version: `dev.2020-02-26`

  • Press Return to check your input parameters
  • Press F5 to retry
  • Check if this issue was already reported on GitHub (give it a thumbs-up)
  • Open a GitHub Issue if this error persists

item.title: This is the same chemical that was likely used in Denver all...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

This is the same chemical that was likely used in Denver all summer too, jsyk.

#DefundThePolice

"The United States‚Äôs routine use of potentially lethal chemical weapons in urban areas, often during peaceful or nonviolent protests, in ways that affect the entire populace as well as the environment. ‚ÄúI plead with all law enforcement agencies who have HC in their arsenal to decommission it immediately,‚Äù Simonis said. ‚ÄúThere is no reason for any police agency to possess it.‚Äù

...

https://truthout.org/‚Ä¶/police-deployed-potentially-lethal-‚Ä¶/

See MoreThe hexachloroethane smoke that police used against protesters can cause vomiting, respiratory distress and even death.

item.title: ‚ÄúAs winter drags on, people must reimagine the ways they‚Äôve...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

‚ÄúAs winter drags on, people must reimagine the ways they‚Äôve been surviving the pandemic, says Apryl Alexander, a clinical and forensic psychologist and an associate professor at the University of Denver‚Äôs Graduate School of Professional Psychology. ‚ÄúWith economic strain and cold weather comes the loss of many of the activities ‚Äî online shopping and outdoor activities ‚Äî that were giving us distractions and connections,‚Äù Alexander says.‚Äù

With more than 450,000 dead and no clear end in sight, some have found tools for coping with loss and stress are no longer working.

vox.com

What you‚Äôre feeling is grief

item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280The Root

She made you wanna dance w/ somebody.

She reminded you not to cry, because on earth we weren‚Äôt meant to stay

She was a mathematician, because if 6 of y‚Äôall went... out, then 4 of you were really cheap

She was every woman & she will always be THE VOICE.

Rest Easy Whitney Houston! #BlackExcellence

item.title: Innovation in Colorado is all around us, especially in the field...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Innovation in Colorado is all around us, especially in the field of housing and homelessness. Hear from experts on some alternatives that make headlines for creative, thoughtful, and compassionate approaches when traditional housing options are hard to come by.

This event is part of the Colorado Coalition for the Homeless 2021 Education Series.

This event is free and everyone is welcome to join.

...

Panelists include:
-Cole Chandler, Executive Director, Colorado Village Collaborative
-Joseph Zanovitch, Executive Director, HOPE of Longmont
-Jenna Salerno, Street Medicine Program Nurse, Colorado Coalition for the Homeless
-Dave Neuhausel, Pastor, Denver Community Church
-Robin Wood-Mason, Director of Development & Communications, The Delores Project

See More

WED, FEB 17 AT 5:00 PM MST

Alternatives to Homelessness: Innovative Solutions That Work

Online EventCauses ¬∑ 360 people

item.title: Black Lives Matter 5280Boulder County Public HealthStreet drugs in Boulder County have been found to contain Fentanyl. They are Xanax and...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280Boulder County Public Health

Street drugs in Boulder County have been found to contain Fentanyl. They are Xanax and Oxycodone 30 mg pills currently being circulated in the community. Fentan...yl is 50-100 times more potent than heroin, and significantly increases the risk of death from accidental overdose. Anyone who may use street drugs, or knows someone who does, should keep Naloxone (an overdose reversal drug) with them at all times. Read more in the press release at www.boco.org/Fentanyl0221

See More

item.title: Black Lives Matter 5280+7Trans Student Educational ResourcesToday‚Äôs a good day to literally decolonize everything u know about...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280+7Trans Student Educational Resources

Today‚Äôs a good day to literally decolonize everything u know about ‚ú®womanhood‚ú®

Womanhood is a violent tool rooted in yt cis heteropatriachy. Womanhood thrives o...ff of policing (yes policing) people back into the gender binary.

Trans women literally pose no threat to cis women and yet trans women like myself are still treated as a threat. Why is that?! Oh right, white supremacy, patriarchy, the gender binary etc!

All of this white supremacist slickery needs to stop ‚úã womanhood is upheld by white supremacy and directly tied to colonialism.

Learn to detach your understanding of womanhood and femininity from all bodies.

Information gathered from @alokvmenon piece ‚Äústop harassing gnc femmes‚Äù and from tweets.
.
.
.
.
.
.
Image description [important reminders about womanhood by @iamlexchandra ] #womanhood #gender #genderisasocialconstruct #genderisover #transwomenarewomen #transwoman #transwomen #lgbt #smashthepatriarchy #fuckpatriarchy #patriarchy #decolonize #femme #femmedomme #femmeboy #femmes #queer #queerfemme #transfemme #nonbinary #transgender #nonbinaryfemme #transnonbinary #gendernonconforming #gendernonbinary #enby #transrights #transrightsarehumanrights #transpride #transmemes

item.title: Black Lives Matter 5280Denver Homeless Out LoudAfter some warm days last week we are approaching another week of frigid temperatures. This...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280Denver Homeless Out Loud

After some warm days last week we are approaching another week of frigid temperatures. This is when the city has decided to resume sweeping unhoused community m...embers to where? to nowhere....
This will be the 10th time this same encampment is swept in the last year. Proving that sweeping people DOES NOT WORK! DOTI has planned a SWEEP for February 10 and 11, 2021 in the area of Stout Street from 22nd to Park Avenue, 22nd from Champa to California and Park Avenue. The SWEEP will begin on both days at 6:30 a.m.
Please come and support our unhoused community members at 21st, 22nd, Stout and Park as they demand real housing or places where they are allowed to survive.
Bring the following things to assist residents:
-Truck, or any vehicle to help move
-Carts
-Bungee Cords
-Rope
-Trash Bags
-Food
-Coffee/CoCo
-Water
Your assistance is much appreciated! Somewhere around 6:30am and all morning help will likely be needed.
Toward Rights, Dignity and Housing‚Ä¶

See More

item.title: ‚ÄúThe plaintiffs here are family members of a dead young man....
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

‚ÄúThe plaintiffs here are family members of a dead young man. Elijah McClain‚Äôs family deserves answers to the questions of why he died and whether anyone or any entity is to be held to account,‚Äù wrote U.S. Magistrate Judge N. Reid Neureiter in a Jan. 29 order.

#TheyTriedIt #JusticeForElijahMcClain

The judge said Elijah McClain's family 'deserves answers to the questions of why he died and whether anyone or any entity is to be held to account.'

9news.com

Court rejects request to pause McClain family‚Äôs civil suit against Aurora, employees

The judge said Elijah McClain's family 'deserves answers to the questions of why he died and whether anyone or any entity is to be held to account.'The judge said Elijah McClain's family 'deserves answers to the questions of why he died and whether anyone or any entity is to be held to account.'

item.title: What happened is foul but not at all surprising coming from...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

What happened is foul but not at all surprising coming from Denver Health. They were just under fire in November for retaliating against whistleblowers raising concerns about systemic racism. Tay Anderson and his mama deserve better, and the fight for an end to policing of our hospitals is far from over.
Please like, share, and comment to help amplify this injustice and call for change!
And email Patient_advocates@dhha.org to ask them what is being done to ensure that this does not happen again! #DefundThePolice #DefendBlackLife #WeKeepUsSafe #CounselorsNotCops #MedicalRacism #DenverHealth
(image description in comments)
item.author: Black Lives Matter 5280

item.title: Black Lives Matter 5280BLM 5280 Freedom School"When children attend schools that place a greater value in discipline and security than on...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280BLM 5280 Freedom School

"When children attend schools that place a greater value in discipline and security than on knowledge and intellectual development, they are attending prep scho...ols for prison." Angela Davis

The Black Lives Matter 5280 Freedom Schools is fighting to end zero-tolerance policies and for districts to hire more counselors and not cops. Black children deserve to attend schools that foster their curiosity and brilliance and values their excellence. Get involved in the Black Lives Matter at School Year of Action.

Black Lives Matter at School Year of Action Demands:
1. End zero-tolerance policies
2. Mandate Black History
3. Hire more Black teachers
4. Hire more counselors not cops

item.title: Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will continue to share links to bail/legal support fundraising in Denver, Minneapolis and beyond. We encourage friends to donate to BLM5280‚Äôs Emergency Fund using Venmo http://venmo.com/BLM5280 . These donations will be used for bail, legal support, and provision of direct services for Black people impacted by the current and ongoing crisis. If you would like to make a tax-deductible donation that we will have access to at a later date, you can visit our Colorado Gives Day Page to donate through our fiscal sponsor, Rocky Mountain Peace and Justice Center.

Working with residents and organizations in Denver, Black Lives Matter 5280 assists in building more loving and united Black communities while eliminating anti-Black violence and racism. To expose, address and eradicate structures and systems of oppression in Denver, BLM5280 uses a holistic racial j...
